name: E2logy
description:
We're a full service software services company with expertise in custom application development. 
Our focus area is Enterprise apps, Web applications & Websites, Mobile Apps, Remote Cloud Support and Digital Analytics Implementation.
Our services include Architecting, Designing, Development, Testing, Hosting, Maintenance and Marketing of applications.
We're headquartered in India since 2005 (4 offices) with local representation in USA, Canada, UK & Singapore. Our team strength is 125+ full time employees and we're proud to be ISO 9001 & ISO 27001 certified. In 2011, Deloitte ranked us in Fastest 50 growing companies and we're partners with Amazon AWS, Paypal, Shopify, Appcelerator, CompTIA etc.
Our mission is:
Achieve outstanding customer satisfaction via great overall experience.
Be always on time without compromising commitments.
Provide top notch quality services at very competitive market rates.
Customers such as Large Enterpries, Small & Medium Businesses & Start ups have availed our services to achieve their objectives with outstanding success.
